input_email_body:
Subject: Issue Reported: Website Loading Slowly

Greetings Customer Support, I am contacting you to report that the website is loading slowly My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. This has occurred unexpectedly and might be due to a high volume of traffic. Despite attempting to restart the server and verify network connectivity, the problem continues to persist You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Could you please look into this and offer a solution at your earliest convenience? If there is any additional information needed from me to address this, please let me know. I look forward to your response. Thank you for your assistance.
